types.section:
{{fr-adj}}

# In which only those meeting a certain educational standard may vote {{q|of a voting system}}
types.html:
capacitaire (plural capacitaires)

  1. In which only those meeting a certain educational standard may vote (of a voting system)
trans: In which only those meeting a certain educational standard may vote

types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# {{lb|fr|legal}} a person having a specified [[capacity]], especially one having a [[law]] [[degree]]
types.html:
capacitaire m (plural capacitaires)

  1. (law) a person having a specified capacity, especially one having a law degree
trans: a person having a specified capacity, especially one having a law degree
